meanings.definition: To send or deliver (a package or letter) using the services of the company FedEx.
meanings.sent1: I will fedex the documents to you tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses to fedex important packages for quick delivery.
meanings.sent3: Instead of waiting, I decided to fedex my lunch to the office.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a fedex package, arriving unexpectedly and swiftly.
meanings.sent5: The idea was so urgent that it needed to be fedexed immediately.

meanings.definition: A company that provides delivery services for packages and letters.
meanings.sent1: Fedex is known for its reliable delivery services.
meanings.sent2: The package was sent through Fedex for secure transportation.
meanings.sent3: I dreamt of a magical Fedex that delivered surprises every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a Fedex package, bringing joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The Fedex logo is easily recognizable with its bold colors.
